title: How to change text on the button?
content:
I am new to reversing and I need to get some reversing experience.
I need help on how to change the text on the Button.
for example my Delphi xe app have the button(Continue) and I want to change it to (Carry on).

How can I accomplish that?
Thank you.

answers_data.content: Open the executable file with a hex editor, search for the string "Continue", and overwrite those bytes with the string "Carry on".
